name: Idle Fidget Spinner Wars
description:
Idle Fidget Spinner Wars is a simple game featuring the fidget spinners.
In this game you can buy your fidget spinner and spin it to reach higher levels and earn gold coins through it. Each level requires a certain number of spins. When you complete those spins, you will be awarded with coins which you can use to unlock more than 30 different spinners.

Each spinner has its own smoothness level. More the smoothness, lesser the friction, that means it will keep spinning for more time.

If you choose the spinner with the highest smoothness value it will keep spinning for a lot of time once you add certain speed to it.

You can swipe the screen to spin the fidget spinner.

You level and number of spins will be posted onto leaderboard so that you can compare your score with your friends and challenge them as well.
